message.content: {"given_definition_quality":80,"better_definition":"classmate; a fellow student in the same class","sentence":"同学在这里。","image_prompt":"An animation in a soft apocalypse style showing two young students standing together with school bags, smiling at each other, in a simple classroom setting.
